Cmp3\ContentProcessing

Class HtmlSetTransparentBackground

Cmp3\ContentProcessing\ProcessorAbstract
Cmp3\ContentProcessing\ReplaceAbstract
Cmp3\ContentProcessing\HtmlSetTransparentBackground

All Implemented Interfaces:

ProcessorInterface
public class HtmlSetTransparentBackground
extends ReplaceAbstract

Content processors which add CSS to HTML content to set the background transparent.

This might be handy for PDF generation.

STATUS: beta

Field Summary

protected array $configArray

Field Detail

$configArray

protected array $configArray = array('preg_replace.'=>array('_CSS_PRINT.'=>array('search'=>'#</head>#i','replace'=>"<style type=\"text/css\">\nhtml, body { background: transparent; background-color: transparent; }</style>\n</head>",),))
